jd: From: sweety, Source InfoTech Inc sweety@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: sweety@sourceinfotech.com Hi,Hope you all are doing well,Please find the job description below,Title: AWS Cloud DBALocation: Jersey City, NJ (Hybrid Onsite)(Local to NJ/NY only with local ID)Duration: 6 months C2HIV: Phone and VideoVisa: GC and USC *** MUST Have Investment Banking and Market Data environment experience***Team is currently looking for a AWS Cloud DBA with experience doing DevOps.Cloud Database RDS2-3 years of experience with AWS Databases • Experience in migrating data from on-prem to RDS and 53 Exceptional knowledge of AWS Console, AWS CLI S3, DMS ◦ RDS: Postgres, MYSOL, Aurora Postgres and NoSQL (MongoDB) Cloud Watch • Good knowiedge of ◦ AWS SDK e RedShift ◦ Snowflake O Redis ○ High Availability and disaster recovery ◦ MSKIStreaming/Messaging Architectures AWS IAM and integration with AW'S Identity Center ○ Service Resiliency - HADR designs/solutions tied to business tiering - replication across AZs and Regions e ETL Tools/MWAA AirfiowlAWS Glue EKS/ECR • Knowledge of ◦ Non-relational AWS databases: DynamoDB, Document DB, Neptune, OpenSearch ◦ Load balancing • Nice to have Experience in migrating data from on-prem into Snowflake, RedShift Automation/DevOps Experience• Exceptional knowledge of: ○ Python, Terraform, Cloud Formation Lambda Enterprise level Application Integration experience on AWS Experience with ◦ Automation and monitoring within AWS ○ Continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) • Ability to automate migration of data to RDS, $3, Snowflake, Redshift Thanks,SweetyIT RecruiterSource InfoTech Inc.,Voice: (609) 934-3545 Ext - 135Email: sweety@sourceinfotech.com Disclaimer: If you are not interested in receiving our e-mails then please reply with a "REMOVE" in the subject line at remove@sourceinfotech.com for automatic removal. And mention all the e-mail addresses to be removed with any e-mail addresses, which might be diverting the e-mails to you. We are sorry for the inconvenience
